publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1728# Mark Ballard: Jubilee Scotland—That the Parliament notes the Jubilee Scotland exhibition in the Garden Lobby from 20 to 23 September 2004; welcomes the work of Jubilee Scotland in campaigning for cancellation of unsustainable debt in developing countries; welcomes the exhibition’s focus on the 2005 G8 Summit in Gleneagles; further notes that it would cost only £3 per person per year over the next 10 years to cancel our share of third world debt, and finally notes that a letter to the Chancellor of the Exchequer to this effect is available for members and staff to sign. Supported by: Christine Grahame*
S2M-1728# Jubilee Scotland (lodged on 21 September 2004) Carolyn Leckie*, Frances Curran*
S2M-1728# Jubilee Scotland (lodged on 21 September 2004) Campbell Martin*, Chris Ballance*, Mike Pringle*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Des McNulty*, Patrick Harvie*, Shiona Baird*

S2M-1728# Mark Ballard: Jubilee Scotland—That the Parliament notes the Jubilee Scotland exhibition in the Garden Lobby from 20 to 23 September 2004; welcomes the work of Jubilee Scotland in campaigning for cancellation of unsustainable debt in developing countries; welcomes the exhibition’s focus on the 2005 G8 Summit in Gleneagles; further notes that it would cost only £3 per person per year over the next 10 years to cancel our share of third world debt, and finally notes that a letter to the Chancellor of the Exchequer to this effect is available for members and staff to sign. Supported by: Christine Grahame, Carolyn Leckie, Frances Curran, Campbell Martin, Chris Ballance, Mike Pringle, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Des McNulty, Patrick Harvie, Shiona Baird, Eleanor Scott*, Margo MacDonald*, John Swinburne*
S2M-1728# Jubilee Scotland (lodged on 21 September 2004) Robin Harper*, Tommy Sheridan*, Rob Gibson*
S2M-1728# Jubilee Scotland (lodged on 21 September 2004) Mr Mark Ruskell*, Ms Sandra White*, Jackie Baillie*, Alex Neil*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1728# Jubilee Scotland (lodged on 21 September 2004) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-1728# Jubilee Scotland (lodged on 21 September 2004) Rosie Kane*
S2M-1728# Jubilee Scotland (lodged on 21 September 2004) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-1728# Jubilee Scotland (lodged on 21 September 2004) Elaine Smith*
